description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

1.0.description:
Band Hero v1.0
Guitar Hero On Tour v1.0
Guitar Hero On Tour Decades v1.0
Guitar Hero On Tour Modern Hits v1.0
LEGO Rock Band v1.0
1.0.title: Initial Releases

25.12.11.description:
Band Hero v1.1
“Filler Item” renamed to “Secret Note”
“Starter Song” checkers renamed to “Starting Song” to match my other manuals
“Victory” renamed to “Play 5 Goal Songs” for better clarity on the Goal Condition
New check for getting a Full Combo (logically requires access to all songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for achieving a 100 note streak (logically requires access to 10 songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for failing a song (available from the start)
New check for activating Star Power (available from the start)

Guitar Hero On Tour v1.1
“Victory” renamed to “Play 5 Goal Songs” for better clarity on the Goal Condition
New check for getting a Full Combo (logically requires access to all songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for achieving a 100 note streak (logically requires access to 10 songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for failing a song (available from the start)
New check for activating Star Power (available from the start)

Guitar Hero On Tour Decades v1.1
“Victory” renamed to “Play 5 Goal Songs” for better clarity on the Goal Condition
New check for getting a Full Combo (logically requires access to all songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for achieving a 100 note streak (logically requires access to 10 songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for failing a song (available from the start)
New check for activating Star Power (available from the start)

Guitar Hero On Tour Modern Hits v1.1
“Victory” renamed to “Play 5 Goal Songs” for better clarity on the Goal Condition
New check for getting a Full Combo (logically requires access to all songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for achieving a 100 note streak (logically requires access to 10 songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for failing a song (available from the start)
New check for activating Star Power (available from the start)

LEGO Rock Band v1.1
“Victory” renamed to “Play 5 Goal Songs” for better clarity on the Goal Condition
New check for getting a Full Combo (logically requires access to all songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for getting a Perfect Solo (logically requires access to all songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for achieving a 100 note streak (logically requires access to 10 songs so you aren’t forced to do it on songs you don’t have the skill for but intended to be available from the start)
New check for failing a song (available from the start)
New check for activating Overdrive (available from the start)

Rock Revolution v1.0
To maintain compatibility with playing the songs in other games, the Activate Power Meter check is toggleable in the yaml
To maintain compatibility with the actual game, Bullet with Butterfly Wings is toggleable in the yaml
Additionally, this game had DLC which is toggleable in the yaml

The Beatles Rock Band v1.0
This game had DLC which is toggleable in the yaml
25.12.11.title: Rock Revolution and The Beatles Rock Band Release
